name: Saucer Escape
description:
Try not to get abducted by Aliens as you make your way across the map․ Collect coins to open the gate on the other side․ Maybe we can reason with these Aliens? Happy Halloweenǃǃǃ
If you like the game and would like to see me make more games in the future I would appreciate your support. Leave a comment on the game and if you're able to donate to me that would be greatly appreciated!
Also, I'm currently looking for others to build a team and make more games with, so if you're interested then please contact me, thanks
